title: Giro d’Italia Memories: Hampsten’s Ice-Conquering Triumph and Basso’s Success
content:
This year’s Giro is a reminder of how great this race can be. My first memory of the Giro d’Italia dates back to 1988 when Andy Hampsten became the first and only American to win the race overall.
